pcd.data

Class PointOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • pcd.imageviewer.Overlay
      • pcd.data.PointOverlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class PointOverlay
extends pcd.imageviewer.Overlay
implements Serializable
    Author:
    Tibor Sloboda The Graphics object responsible for drawing points and angles on the image
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • PointOverlay

        PointOverlay(ArrayList<PcdPoint> points,
             ArrayList<String> typeIconList,
             ArrayList<Integer> typeIdentifierList)
        Initializes the PointOverlay with points and icons/colors. Adds RGB colors via PcdColor where applicable otherwise icon
        Parameters:
        points - the reference to list of PcdPoint to draw
        typeIconList - the list of icon files or RGB strings
        typeIdentifierList - the list of point identifiers to match colors

    • Method Detail

      • paint

        public void paint(Graphics2D g,
                  BufferedImage image,
                  AffineTransform transform)
        Draws a 25 by 25 rectangle marker for every point with respective color based on type. This size expands to 75 by 75 when point is selected.

        Contains affine transformation to scale points based on zoom and position on the image. Also draws angle in respect to horizontal plane.

        Specified by:
        paint in class pcd.imageviewer.Overlay
        Parameters:
        g - the Graphics2D plane to draw on
        image - the BufferedImage based on which transformations happen
        transform - affine transformations to scale and adjust point coordinates based on viewport

      • setOpacity

        public void setOpacity(float opacity)
        Changes the opacity of markers by setting opacity.
        Parameters:
        opacity - the opacity to set markers to, from 0 to 1.0
